title: A new year of gadgets
description: In 2021 there are a few big CES trends to keep an eye on. There are concept devices from Razer and LG; processor news from AMD, Intel, and Nvidia; some very great laptops (especially gaming laptops); and of course the state of the art for televisions move forward once again. In this recap, Dieter Bohn breaks it all down.
